details.overview: Tax and reporting rules for employers providing inducement (golden hello) payments
details.body:
Inducement (often called ‘golden hello’) payments counts as earnings.

You’ll need to:

  • add the payments to your employee’s other earnings
  • deduct and pay PAYE tax and Class 1 National Insurance through payroll

Technical guidance

The following guides contain more detailed information:

  • employment income: inducement payments

  • Class 1 NICs: ‘golden hellos’
